pullrequest.title: Add random walk support to GaussianNoise

content.raw:
I think that would work. We are currently discussing design ideas for sensors in the following document:

* https://osrfoundation.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/GAZ/pages/11599873/Ignition+Sensors

I'll make sure to put a reference to this discussion there in case this doesn't get merged.
